thread.title: Which Air New Zealand safety video is your favourite?
thread.title_full: Which Air New Zealand safety video is your favourite?

title: Which Air New Zealand safety video is your favourite?
text:
Which Air New Zealand safety video is your favourite? Last updated 09:58, August 13 2015 Air NZ 
A compilation of some of Air NZ's infamous safety videos. 
In an effort to retain the attention of frequent flyers, Air New Zealand has recruited the All Blacks to star in their latest inflight safety video. 
From sexy surfers and controversial bikini-clad models to hobbits and elves, the national carrier has consistently proved itself as an innovator in the production of inflight safety videos. 
Here we look back on some of videos released over the years. 
WATCH:
